cancelExpiredAgreement(uint256).details: Only allowed after deadline and when no party has confirmed. Callable by anyone

params.escrowOwner: The address of the initial owner

createAgreement(address,address,uint256).details: Only the payer can call this function and must send ether with it. The agreement starts in Funded state.

params._payee: The recipient of the funds if agreement completes

extendDeadline(uint256,uint256).details: Only callable by payer, and only if agreement is in Funded state and payee has not confirmed

params._newDeadline: New future timestamp greater than current deadline

returns._0: Agreement struct including payer, payee, arbiter, amount, deadline, etc

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

payeeRequestCompletion(uint256).details: Must be called before the deadline. Only the payee can call this.

payerRequestCompletion(uint256).details: Only callable after payee has confirmed. Only the payer can call this.

raiseDispute(uint256).details: Dispute cannot be raised if both have confirmed, or neither has. Must be in Funded state.

releaseFunds(uint256).details: Requires both payer and payee to have confirmed. Only payee can call. Prevents reentrancy.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resolveDispute(uint256,address).details: Can only be called when agreement is in InDispute state. Winner must be either payer or payee.

params.winner: The selected address (payer or payee) who receives the funds

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

cancelExpiredAgreement(uint256).notice: Cancels an expired agreement and returns funds to payer

constructor.notice: Initializes the escrow contract and sets the owner

createAgreement(address,address,uint256).notice: Creates a new escrow agreement between payer and payee

extendDeadline(uint256,uint256).notice: Payer can extend the deadline before payee confirmation

getAgreements(uint256).notice: Returns details of a specific agreement

getEscrowBalance().notice: Returns the current total balance held by the escrow contract

payeeRequestCompletion(uint256).notice: Payee requests completion after delivering the work

payerRequestCompletion(uint256).notice: Payer confirms the work and requests completion

raiseDispute(uint256).notice: Either party can raise a dispute after the deadline if confirmations are not aligned

releaseFunds(uint256).notice: Payee releases funds after mutual confirmation

resolveDispute(uint256,address).notice: Arbiter resolves a dispute by selecting the winner
